titleStmt.title: The historie of Titana, and Theseus Very pleasant for age to avoid drowsie thoughts: profitable for youth to avoide wanton pastimes: so that to both it brings the mindes content. Written by W. Bettie.
titleStmt.author: Bettie, W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Laurence Lane, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in St. Laurence Lane, at the signe of the Bible
